basic.floral_language:
Salvia splendens
Floriography: wisdom, energy and sunshine 
String also known as "red fireworks ", "red ivory”. 
String blade ovoid to cordate, margin with a round of saw tooth. Flower like grain shape, the color is mainly red. The flowers open from bottom to top. Long-lasting flowers and beautiful, often used for flower border, flower bed arrangement or beautification household environment. 
String like sunshine, semi-shadow resistance. Flowering from June to Sept, ornamental period 1 to 2 months.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-September, viewing period 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
